original_title: 生理的に死ぬほど嫌いな初老上司に無理やり同伴出張させられて… 恥辱と体液にまみれ一晩中犯●れた人妻社員 奥田咲 OL, 単体作品, 巨乳, 人妻, パイズリ, 寝取り、寝取られ, ギリモザ
overview: Saki, 28 years old, married her husband who was a colleague and once entered the family, but returned to work for the cost of purchasing an apartment. Her director Tabuchi, who has been keeping an eye on Saki for a long time, plans a business trip to Kyushu with just the two of them. I couldn't go against her manager's order and went on a business trip with her. "That's the prey I was aiming for...I'll entertain you until morning."A night of shame when she was fucked by her unfaithful boss who hates her to death and made her cum many times.
title: I Was Forced To Accompany My Elderly Boss, Who I Physiologically Hate To Death, And Forced Me To Accompany Her On A Business Trip… A Married Woman Who Was Covered In Shame And Body Fluids And Fucked All Night Saki Okuda
